name: Loading State Animation
description:
Introduction:

This is a very simple interactive component to help you create the “loading state” animation for your UI stack.

One of the best UX/UI practices is to take into account that a product could have different states depending on the input and the circumstances (think of a user who lost their internet connection while using your app), it doesn't matter what your product is, it’s probably going to need the full UI stack (blank, loading, partial, error, ideal) states.



What will you find in the file:

  • The basic shapes (circle, square, bar) animation, but you still can edit and reshape them to your needs.
  • Stylized colors all across the file.

 

 

How To Use This File:

  • Make an instance from the button component.
  • Reshape the instance like you need.

 

Creating responsive reusable components is a key for successful and speedy prototypes, especially when there is no direct way to create something, that’s why I wanted to create this component and share it with you.
